description:
Drum’s inability to master his newfound Omni Lord powers forces Gao to miss out on further Buddy Police duties. But Tetsuya is happy to step in to face off against a mysterious traveller from Hero World whose intentions seem dubious at best.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Punishment for Disrespect! Infinite Death Crest!
切り捨て御免! 死ヶ峰無限剣[インフィニティ・デスクレスト]!!
